PHRASE.LANG: Emerald, Ruby, and Sapphire Suit Bundle (Male and Female)
Pack de tenues Émeraude, Rubis et Saphir (pour homme et femme)
Smaragd-, Rubin- und Saphiranzug-Paket (Herren und Damen)
Completi Smeraldo, Rubino e Zaffiro (uomo e donna)
Conjunto de traje esmeralda, rubí y zafiro (hombre y mujer)
Emerald, Ruby, and Sapphire Suit Bundle (Male and Female)
Bundle includes male and female Emerald, Ruby, and Sapphire suits each consisting of a jacket, cane, trousers, and shoes. [#Legal]
Ce pack comprend les tenues Émeraude, Rubis et Saphir. Chaque tenue est composée d'une veste, d'une canne, d'un pantalon et de chaussures. [#Legal]
Das Paket beinhaltet einen Smaragd-, einen Rubin- und einen Saphiranzug für Herren und Damen, die jeweils aus Jacke, Stock, Hose und Schuhen bestehen. [#Legal]
Questo pacchetto comprende completi Smeraldo, Rubino e Zaffiro da uomo e donna. Ciascun completo include una giacca, un bastone, pantaloni e scarpe. [#Legal]
Este conjunto incluye trajes esmeralda, rubí y zafiro para hombre y mujer y cada uno cuenta con chaqueta, bastón, pantalones y zapatos. [#Legal]

Own the Shiny Diamond Suit (Male) and/or Diamond Suit (Female) and get these suits at a discount. Bundle includes the male and female Emerald, Ruby, and Sapphire suits each consisting of a jacket, cane, pants, and shoes. [#Legal]
